description: This series of topical seminars introduce students to the latest innovations and developments in a range of industries and the career pathways they could undertake. Leading industry experts will be brought in to share their insights and advise students on the knowledge, skills and attributes that are needed to enter and succeed in each field. Complementary field trips will allow students to see how theory is applied in the industrial context. Workshop will provide the opportunity to develop and apply industry-valued transferrable skills, such as the ability to network and plan for their careers, culminating in an actionable career plan.
title: Science & Technology Industry Insights I
